food1.name: MRE
food1.flavour_text:
Military-grade leftovers from before the war. Tasteless and not very filling, but it's better than nothing. 

Restores 15 Stamina.

food2.name: Canned Food
food2.flavour_text:
Preserved meat and vegetables in a sealed canister. The expiration date has been scratched out.

Restores 25 Stamina.

food3.name: Dried Meat
food3.flavour_text:
It's hard to tell what animal this meat came from, but beggars can't be choosers.

Restores 40 Stamina.
